summary.overallFindings: Goldman Sachs demonstrates comprehensive, concrete Responsible AI practices across all seven pillars, with detailed public evidence supporting transparency, fairness, explainability, human oversight, privacy, governance, and public commitments. The company provides executive-level frameworks, technical documentation, and external audit participation, reflecting a mature and transparent approach to AI risk management. No significant gaps were identified in any pillar, indicating a strong organizational commitment to Responsible AI. The breadth and depth of evidence suggest industry leadership in responsible and ethical AI deployment.
